alert.note: Alert for Baker; Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 12:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, southeastern Baker, Clay and central Duval Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Arlington to near George`s Lake. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Keystone Heights, Mandarin, Arlington, Middleburg, Cisco Gardens, Ortega, Oakleaf Plantation and Cecil Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
